Class BookingsController

This class handles all requestes related to bookings. That means that it handles all web requests to /bookings

Inheritance

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

GetAllAsync()

Queries all bookings in the database and returns a http response that indicates if results were found. Additionally, if there are any results, it returns a list of ecruise.Models.Bookings.

Declaration
public Task<IActionResult> GetAllAsync()
Returns
Type Description
Task<IActionResult>

HTTP 200 Ok: Returns a List of ecruise.Models.Bookings if ecruise.Models.Bookings everything's okay.
HTTP 204 No Content: There are no ecruise.Models.Bookings.
Examples

GET /bookings

| Improve this Doc View Source

GetAsync(UInt64)

Queries one ecruise.Models.Booking identified by id and returns it, if existent.

Declaration
public Task<IActionResult> GetAsync(ulong id)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.UInt64 id

The booking id to search for
Returns
Type Description
Task<IActionResult>

HTTP 200 Ok: Returns the ecruise.Models.Booking if everything's okay.
HTTP 400 Bad Request: The provided parameters are malformed.
HTTP 401 Unauthorized: The authenticated customer has no access to the requested ecruise.Models.Booking.
HTTP 404 Not Found: There is no booking with such an id.
Examples

GET /bookings/5

| Improve this Doc View Source

GetByBookingDateAsync(String)

Find all ecruise.Models.Booking that were booked at a certain date. An error response is set if there's was ecruise.Models.Booking on that date.

Declaration
public Task<IActionResult> GetByBookingDateAsync(string date)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String date
Returns
Type Description
Task<IActionResult>

HTTP 200 Ok: Returns the ecruise.Models.Booking booked at the requested date.
HTTP 203 No Content: There is no ecruise.Models.Booking that was booked on that date.
HTTP 400 Bad Request: The provided parameters are malformed.
Examples

GET: /Bookings/by-booking-date/{date}

| Improve this Doc View Source

GetByCustomerIdAsync(UInt64)

Find all ecruise.Models.Booking that belongs to a associated ecruise.Models.Customer identified by it's customerId. An error response is set if there's no such related ecruise.Models.Booking.

Declaration
public IActionResult GetByCustomerIdAsync(ulong customerId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.UInt64 customerId
Returns
Type Description
IActionResult

HTTP 200 Ok: Returns the ecruise.Models.Booking associated with the requested .
HTTP 203 No Content: There is no ecruise.Models.Booking that the current customer can access associated with the requested customerId.
HTTP 400 Bad Request: The provided parameters are malformed.
Examples

GET: /bookings/by-customer/5

PostAsync(Booking)

Try to create a new ecruise.Models.Booking with the data provided by booking.

Declaration
public Task<IActionResult> PostAsync(Booking booking)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ecruise.Models.Booking booking
Returns
Type Description
Task<IActionResult>

HTTP 201 Created: Returns a ecruise.Models.PostReference to the created object on success.
HTTP 400 Bad Request: The provided parameters are malformed.
HTTP 401 Unauthorized: The authenticated customer has no access to create the provided ecruise.Models.Booking.
HTTP 404 Not Found: There is no customer with CustomerId provided in booking.
Examples

POST /bookings
